text.div:
Structure
LinkIdTextCardinalityTypeFlagsDescription & Constraints
EmCare.B6.MeasurementsQuestionnairehttps://fhir.dk.swisstph-mis.ch/matchbox/fhir/Questionnaire/emcare.b6.measurements#0.1.0
EmCare.B6.DE01Axillary Temperature (degrees Celcius)1..1quantityExpressions:
  • Enable When: %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B6.DE04').answer.first().empty()
EmCare.B6.DE01-helpThe client’s axillary temperature in degrees Celcius (temperature taken under the armpit)<br /> Warning/error if above 45 and below 32 degrees Celcius.0..1display
EmCare.B6.DE04null1..*choiceOptions: 1 option
Expressions:
  • Enable When: %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B6.DE01').answer.first().empty()
EmCare.B6.DE05Hot to Touch1..1booleanExpressions:
  • Enable When: %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B6.DE04').answer.first().exists()
EmCare.B6.DE01AMeasured Temperature0..1stringExpressions:
  • Enable When: %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B6.DE01').answer.first().exists()
  • Calculated Value: iif(%resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B6.DE01').answer.first().value >= 38.5 'Cel' and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='AgeInMonths').answer.first().value >= 2, '2',iif(%resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B6.DE01').answer.first().value >= 38 'Cel' and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='AgeInMonths').answer.first().value< 2 or %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B6.DE01').answer.first().value >= 37.5 'Cel' and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='AgeInMonths').answer.first().value >= 2,'High',iif(%resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B6.DE01').answer.first().value < 35.5 'Cel', 'Low',iif(%resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B6.DE01').answer.first().value.exists(), 'Normal',{}))))
EmCare.B6.DE01A-helpThe client’s axillary temperature in degrees Celcius (temperature taken under the armpit)0..1display
EmCare.B6.DE06Weight (Kg)1..1quantityExpressions:
  • Enable When: %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B6.DE07').answer.first().empty()
EmCare.B6.DE07null1..*choiceOptions: 1 option
Expressions:
  • Enable When: %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B6.DE06').answer.first().empty()
EmCare.B6.DE08Estimated Weight0..1quantityExpressions:
  • Calculated Value: iif(%resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B6.DE07').answer.first().exists() and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='pastWeightActualised').answer.first().exists(), %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='pastWeightActualised').answer.first().value, {})
AgeInDaysAge in Days0..1integerExpressions:
  • Initial Value: ageindays
pastWeightActualisedWeight based on the previous mesurements0..1quantityExpressions:
  • Initial Value: pastweightactualised
  • Enable When: %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B6.DE08').answer.first().exists()
AgeInMonthsAge in months0..1integerExpressions:
  • Initial Value: ageinmonths
AgeInYearsAge in years0..1integerExpressions:
  • Initial Value: ageinyears
disclamer-1As you cannot measure the weight, the profile weight will be used0..1displayExpressions:
  • Enable When: %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='pastWeightActualised').answer.first().exists() and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B6.DE07').answer.first().exists()
HeightOrLengthnull0..1groupExpressions:
  • Enable When: %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='pastWeightActualised').answer.first().empty() and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B6.DE07').answer.first().exists()
disclamer-2As you cannot measure the weight, the weight for length/height or weight for age will be used0..1display
Height QHeight (cm)1..1quantityExpressions:
  • Enable When: (%resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='AgeInMonths').answer.first().value>=24 and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='HeightOrLength').repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B6.DE11').answer.first().empty() and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='HeightOrLength').repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B6.DE10').answer.first().empty()) or %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='HeightOrLength').repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B6.DE12a').answer.first().exists()
EmCare.B6.DE10null1..*choiceOptions: 1 option
Expressions:
  • Enable When: %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='HeightOrLength').repeat(item).where(linkId='Height Q').answer.first().empty() and (%resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='AgeInMonths').answer.first().value>=24 or %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='HeightOrLength').repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B6.DE12a').answer.first().exists()) and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='HeightOrLength').repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B6.DE12a').answer.first().empty()
EmCare.B6.DE09Height0..1quantityExpressions:
  • Calculated Value: iif(%resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='AgeInMonths').answer.first().value < 24 and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='HeightOrLength').repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B6.DE12a').answer.first().exists(), %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='HeightOrLength').repeat(item).where(linkId='Length Q').answer.first().value-0.7 'cm',%resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='HeightOrLength').repeat(item).where(linkId='Height Q').answer.first().value)
EmCare.B6.DE11null0..*choiceOptions: 1 option
Expressions:
  • Enable When: %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='HeightOrLength').repeat(item).where(linkId='Height Q').answer.first().empty() and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='AgeInMonths').answer.first().value>=24 and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='HeightOrLength').repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B6.DE12a').answer.first().empty() and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='HeightOrLength').repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B6.DE10').answer.first().empty()
Length QLength (cm)1..1quantityExpressions:
  • Enable When: (%resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='AgeInMonths').answer.first().value<24 or %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='HeightOrLength').repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B6.DE10').answer.first().exists()) and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='HeightOrLength').repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B6.DE12a').answer.first().empty() and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='HeightOrLength').repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B6.DE13').answer.first().empty()
EmCare.B6.DE12Length0..1quantityExpressions:
  • Calculated Value: iif(%resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='AgeInMonths').answer.first().value >= 24 and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='HeightOrLength').repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B6.DE10').answer.first().exists(), %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='HeightOrLength').repeat(item).where(linkId='Height Q').answer.first().value+0.7 'cm', %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='HeightOrLength').repeat(item).where(linkId='Length Q').answer.first().value)
EmCare.B6.DE13null1..*choiceOptions: 1 option
Expressions:
  • Enable When: %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='HeightOrLength').repeat(item).where(linkId='Length Q').answer.first().empty() and (%resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='AgeInMonths').answer.first().value<24 or %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='HeightOrLength').repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B6.DE10').answer.first().exists()) and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='HeightOrLength').repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B6.DE10').answer.first().empty()
EmCare.B6.DE12anull0..*choiceOptions: 1 option
Expressions:
  • Enable When: %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='HeightOrLength').repeat(item).where(linkId='Length Q').answer.first().empty() and (%resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='AgeInMonths').answer.first().value<24 or %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='HeightOrLength').repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B6.DE10').answer.first().exists()) and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='HeightOrLength').repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B6.DE10').answer.first().empty()
EmCare.B6.DE16Weight for Age (<span class="caps">WFA</span>) Z Scores0..1integerExpressions:
  • Enable When: %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B6.DE06').answer.first().exists()
EmCare.B6.DE17<span class="caps">MUAC</span> (mm)1..1quantityExpressions:
  • Enable When: %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='AgeInMonths').answer.first().value>=6 and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='HeightOrLength').repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B6.DE17a').answer.first().empty()
EmCare.B6.DE17-helpMid Upper Arm Circumference0..1display
EmCare.B6.DE17anull1..*choiceOptions: 1 option
Expressions:
  • Enable When: %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='AgeInMonths').answer.first().value>=6 and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='HeightOrLength').repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B6.DE17').answer.first().empty()
EmCare.B6.DE18Visually assess for whether underweight (for drug dose calculation)0..1choiceOptions: 3 options
Expressions:
  • Enable When: %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='AgeInMonths').answer.first().value>=2 and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B6.DE07').answer.first().value =true and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='pastWeightActualised').answer.first().empty() and (%resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='AgeInMonths').answer.first().value < 6 'months' or (%resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='AgeInMonths').answer.first().value >=6 'months' and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='HeightOrLength').repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B6.DE17').answer.first().empty()))
timestampnull0..1dateTimeExpressions:
  • Calculated Value: now()

Documentation for this format

Option Sets

Answer options for EmCare.B6.DE04

  • null#EmCare.B6.DE04 ("Thermometer not available")

Answer options for EmCare.B6.DE07

  • null#EmCare.B6.DE07 ("Weight cannot be measured")

Answer options for EmCare.B6.DE10

  • null#EmCare.B6.DE10 ("Prefer to measure length")

Answer options for EmCare.B6.DE11

  • null#EmCare.B6.DE11 ("Height cannot be measured")

Answer options for EmCare.B6.DE13

  • null#EmCare.B6.DE13 ("Length cannot be measured")

Answer options for EmCare.B6.DE12a

  • null#EmCare.B6.DE12a ("Prefer to measure height")

Answer options for EmCare.B6.DE17a

  • null#EmCare.B6.DE17a ("MUAC cannot be measured")

Answer options for EmCare.B6.DE18

  • https://fhir.dk.swisstph-mis.ch/matchbox/fhir/CodeSystem/emcare-custom-codes#EmCare.B6.DE19 ("Does not appear to be Underweight")
  • https://fhir.dk.swisstph-mis.ch/matchbox/fhir/CodeSystem/emcare-custom-codes#EmCare.B6.DE20 ("Appears to be Underweight")
  • https://fhir.dk.swisstph-mis.ch/matchbox/fhir/CodeSystem/emcare-custom-codes#EmCare.B6.DE21 ("Appears to be Severely Underweight")

item.text:
The client’s axillary temperature in degrees Celcius (temperature taken under the armpit)
Warning/error if above 45 and below 32 degrees Celcius.
The client’s axillary temperature in degrees Celcius (temperature taken under the armpit)
Weight based on the previous mesurements
As you cannot measure the weight, the profile weight will be used
As you cannot measure the weight, the weight for length/height or weight for age  will be used
Weight for Age (WFA) Z Scores
Visually assess for whether underweight (for drug dose calculation)

valueCoding.display: Does not appear to be Underweight
